00032 #ifndef TRAINER_HPP_

00035 namespace ebl {
00036 
00038 
00039 template <class T, class L> void supervised::train(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, classifier_meter *mtr) {
00040   ds->seek_begin();
00041   mtr->clear();
00042 }
00043 
00044 template <class T, class L> void supervised::test(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, classifier_meter *mtr) {
00045   ds->seek_begin();
00046   mtr->clear();
00047   for (int i = 0; i < ds->size(); ++i) {
00048     ds->fprop(input, desired);
00049     machine->fprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00050     mtr->update(age, output, desired->get(), energy);
00051     ds->next();
00052   }
00053 }
00054

00058   machine->fprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00059   mtr->test(output, desired, energy);
00060 */      err_not_implemented();
00061 }

00065 template <class T, class L>  void supervised_gradient::train_online(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, classifier_meter *mtr,
00066                 intg n, gd_param *gdp, double kappa = 0.0) {
00067         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00068     ds->fprop(input, desired);
00069     machine->fprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00070     mtr->update(age, output, desired->get(), energy);
00071     param->clear_dx();
00072     machine->bprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00073     param->update_gd(*gdp);
00074     if (kappa != 0.0) {
00075         err_not_implemented();
00076         /*
00077     if (kappa > 0.0)
00078         param->update_xaverage(kappa);
00079     else if (kappa < 0.0)
00080         param->update_xaverage((-kappa) / (1 + age));
00081         */
00082     }
00083     age++;
00084     // info
00085 /*    cout << "age: " << age << " desired: " << (unsigned int) desired->get();
00086     cout << " output_class: " << (unsigned int) output->output_class << " machine->mout->x ";
00087     machine->mout->x.printElems();
00088     cout << endl;
00089 */    // (print (==> ds tell) (desired) :machine:mout:x)
00090     ds->next();
00091         }
00092   // mtr->info(); // TODO
00093 }
00094 
00095 template <class T, class L>  void supervised_gradient::train(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, classifier_meter *mtr,
00096                 gd_param *gdp, double kappa) {
00097   ds->seek_begin();
00098   mtr->clear();
00099   this->train_online(ds, mtr, ds->size(), gdp, kappa);
00100 }
00101 
00102 template <class T, class L>  void supervised_gradient::compute_diaghessian(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, intg n, double mu) {
00103   param->clear_ddeltax();
00104   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00105     ds->fprop(input, desired);
00106     machine->fprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00107     param->clear_dx();
00108     machine->bprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00109     param->clear_ddx();
00110     machine->bbprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00111     param->update_ddeltax((1 / (double) n), 1.0);
00112     ds->next();
00113   }
00114   param->compute_epsilons(mu);
00115   std::cout << "diaghessian inf: " << idx_min(param->epsilons);
00116   std::cout << " sup: " << idx_max(param->epsilons) << std::endl;
00117 }
